ISSUE.TITLE: Remove style overrides from lookup inputs
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Task ##### SUMMARY We should remove the style overrides from the lookup component in favor of using default PatternFly styles. https://www.patternfly.org/v4/documentation/react/components/inputgroup#basic It should look like this screenshot, except with the search icon to the left.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #7244 from ansible/jakemcdermott-remove-auth-props Remove unneeded auth props Reviewed-by: https://github.com/apps/softwarefactory-project-zuul
